about_the_game:
Join Adam, a charismatic yoga master starting his career at the prestigious "Dream Body" fitness club. Find out what secrets it holds and discover everyone’s intricacies in the remastered version of the adult visual novel Sex Coach: Hot Yoga

The story starts with Adam coming to the “Dream Body” for a job interview and meeting the powerful Thelma for the first time ever - she’s a lady to remember! He’s being hired, and a captivating story full of dark secrets starts - although initially things seem to be a regular awkward first day on the job, everything takes unexpected turns as soon as Adam goes to sleep.

A weird, wicked and perverted dream featuring people he met that day awaits - he discovers himself at some kind of orgy taking place in “Dream Body”, and the weirdest thing is that, in the morning, memories of that dream seem to be fading away. Eager to discover what it was, Adam starts his own little investigation…

The full version features 5 days of intriguing story - decide for yourself how the investigation will go and what relationships are worth it. Would you try to solve the mystery of “Dream Body” and the weird dreams you’re getting or just keep living your life?

Enjoy meticulously crafted animations, characters with strong and unique personalities, various locations, mini-games that increase the immersion, a story full of twists, hot adult scenes and much more!

Features:
  • An unusual story in a well-known setting - the plot holds many intriguing mysteries and characters to discover.
  • Fascinating 3D graphics - we’ve put a lot of work into completely reworking the visuals, and the results are very promising!
  • A lot of hot 18+ action - close working relationships lead to many lewd situations with unexpected turns on every corner.
  • QTE, mini-games and location exploration - to further enhance the player experience and immersiveness.
  • One-hand gameplay available - if you catch our drift ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. 
The game graphically depicts sex.
All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Sex Coach: Hot Yoga

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join Adam, a charismatic yoga master starting his career at the prestigious "Dream Body" fitness club. Find out what secrets it holds and discover everyone’s intricacies in the remastered version of the adult visual novel Sex Coach: Hot Yoga
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
